entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Hi, I'd like to return a pair of cycling shoes and some tires I recently purchased.
Okay, I can help you with that. Could you provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Thank you. I see the order here. Before we proceed, could you confirm if the shoes or tires have been mounted or used in any way?
Yes, I did install the tires and tried out the shoes on my bike. I even noticed some cleat marks on the soles of the shoes.

I understand. Unfortunately, because the tires were installed and the shoes show cleat marks and were clearly mounted, we're unable to accept the return. Our return policy states that items must be in new, unused condition to be eligible for a refund. With dirty tires and cleat marks on the shoes, we cannot resell them as new.
Oh, I see. I didn't realize that using them even once would make them non-returnable.
Yes, I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. We do try to make that clear in our policy. Perhaps you could consider selling them online or donating them to a local cycling club?
That's a good idea. Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks for your help!
You're very welcome. Have a great day and enjoy the ride!
